page.title: 07The Smithy Workshop
page.content: { }The{blacksmith}in Sorbie runs a small{industry}where iron and metal goods are made and repaired. He does his work in the{smithy.} The busiest time of year for him is in spring and summer when farmers require to use a lot of machinery.The least busy time is during the winter because there is not much work to do. The blacksmith's {tools}are welders, drills, jacks, spanners, grinders and hammers.He uses these tools to mend farm implements.The welders can join pieces of metal together by heating them to make them soft;the drill can make holes in metal;and the grinder can cut through metal.The blacksmith also makes pokers,gates and signs. The blacksmith is self employed and has no helpers.He has to write his own accounts.He has an average of ten customers each week.
